page.title: 10Old wives tales
page.content: From the older people of the area we have come across many old wives tales, some of them well known, others more obscure. People believe that if you break a mirror you will have seven years of bad luck. It is also bad luck to put new shoes on the table, not to mention it being rather unhygenic too! Ill fortune will ensue also if you look through the window at a new moon. On the other hand, if you turn a coin in your pocket, you will be blessed with good fortune. These beliefs are aptly named "old wives tales" because it is mainly the older generation who take any heed of them. Children are much more cynical these days, and tend to dismiss such ideas as rubbish.
